karthru mandala adhyaksha silarathna senarath mahatha athin maharagama niyojitha ech. yu. pi. pi. jayathilaka mahatha pariganakaya labaganimin meheyum adhyaksha upul disanayaka mahatha moratuwa danwim niyojitha es. si. ee. wijesekara mahathata pariganakaya pirinamaminpuwathpath danwim kalawe thawath piyawarak idiriyata thabamin, luhundu danwim langama lekhawus puwathpath eejantha mangin srujuwa ha kshanikawa antharjalaya osse lekhawus puwathpath wetha yawime nawa wadapiliwelak lekhawus aayathanaya arambaa atha.thathpara gananakin srujuwama puwathpatha wetha danwim ewime me wadasatahana danatamath kriyathmaka wana athara, ee sandaha karyakshamawa kapawu saha bahula lesa danwim laba dun eejanthawaru dedenakuta nawina pariganaka yanthra pirinamima lekhawus aayathanaye di siduwiya.moratuwa danwim niyojitha es. si. ee. wijesekara ha maharagama niyojitha ech. yu. pi. pi. jayathilaka yana mahathwaru mese agayimata lakwu athara, ee-adpro wyapruthiya yatathe me wasara thula thawath niyojithawaru dasa denakuta pariganaka yanthra pirinamenu atha.pramadayakin thorawa danwim labadimata haki wana mema sruju wyapruthiya osse, liwim - faks kirim - apahadilikam mathuwim - pitu sakasim ho sodupath balime awashyathawak pana nonangina heyin paribhogikaya wetha itha karyakshama sewawak laba dimata haki we.

"oya kar thibba kiyala kandaya neda ban..aathal eke bas eke yana eka honda ban oya kehemmal kar wala yanawata wadiya.oowa thibbath maha karadarayak witharayi..ikmanata sawuththu welath yanawa machan..leda godawal..garij gane katta kanda giyama epa wenne..dawasama iwarayine ithin..aneka bariwela yanthan kohe hari yanthan gawunath athi.papadama wage kudu pattam wela yanne..oya kehemmal mala mangul ganan gihin nathi ma wela yana ekamayi honda" kiyala.

gramiya adhyapana kramaya nanga situwima pasal dantha waidya sewaya athi kirima, diwa aaharaya dimei wadapiliwawela (1935), sanwidhanathmaka kala satahan kramaya, madhya maha pasal pradeshiya mattamin aarambha kirima(1939), adhyapanaye sama awastha salasime sankalpaya, pasalata athul wi wishwa widyalaya dakwa nomilaye adhyapanaya laba dima(1946), mawibasin iganwime yojanawa (1946) wani piyawara gananawakin aarambha wu nidahas adhyapanaya piyawara gananawaka muhuwak lesa warthamanaya akwa wikashanaya wemin pawathena aakarayak daknata labe.
